properties.tree_description:
Very tall mature tree extending above powerlines. Visible holes in the trunk and continuous sap leakage. Heavy insect activity present. Roots are exposed and lifting soil and pavement, causing property damage.Reason for Removal:Dying treeComments:Tree appears diseased and decaying. Insect infestation, sap leakage, and visible trunk holes indicate rot or borer damage. Roots are damaging yard and nearby structures. Requesting removal for safety and property protection.
		
		
			Tree number:2Species:EvergreenTree Size (DBH):20Tree location:Front yard , near powerlines and structureDescription of Tree:The tree appears diseased and infested, with insect activity and sap leakage suggesting internal decay or borer damage. Removal is requested for safety and property protection.Reason for Removal:Dying treeComments:Very tall mature tree extending above powerlines. Visible holes in the trunk and continuous sap leakage.
